mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.jijian_settle_infor_sid, t.yearmonth, t.plant_sid, t.plant_code, t.work_center_sid, t.work_center_code, t.product_price_type, t.jixin_wangong_type, t.department, t.product_sid, t.product_code, t.paichan_batch, t.paichan_batch AS paichan_batch_to_string, t.settle_quantity, t.handle_status, t.remark, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t4.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t5.plant_name, t5.short_name as plant_short_name, t6.work_center_name, t7.material_name, t8.customer_sid,t8.customer_code,t8.customer_name,t8.short_name as customer_short_name, t11.name as department_name, t12.total_price_blq, t12.total_price_blh from s_pay_product_jijian_settle_infor t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.creator_account = t2.user_name AND t.client_id = t2.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t.updater_account = t3.user_name AND t.client_id = t3.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t4 ON t.confirmer_account = t4.user_name AND t.client_id = t4.client_id LEFT JOIN s_bas_plant t5 ON t.plant_sid = t5.plant_sid LEFT JOIN s_man_work_center t6 ON t.work_center_sid = t6.work_center_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t7 ON t.product_sid = t7.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_customer t8 ON t7.customer_sid = t8.customer_sid LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data t9 ON t9.dict_type = 's_product_price_type' AND t.product_price_type = t9.dict_value LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data t10 ON t10.dict_type = 's_jixin_wangong_type' AND t.jixin_wangong_type = t10.dict_value LEFT JOIN s_con_manufacture_department t11 ON t.department = t11.code LEFT JOIN s_pay_product_process_step t12 ON t.plant_sid = t12.plant_sid and t.product_sid = t12.product_sid and t.department = t12.department and t.product_price_type = t12.product_price_type and t.jixin_wangong_type = t12.jixin_wangong_type
mapper.insert:
insert into s_pay_product_jijian_settle_infor
client_id, jijian_settle_infor_sid, yearmonth, plant_sid, plant_code, work_center_sid, work_center_code, product_price_type, jixin_wangong_type, department, product_sid, product_code, paichan_batch, settle_quantity, handle_status, remark, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.jijianSettleInforSid}, #{item.yearmonth}, #{item.plantSid}, #{item.plantCode}, #{item.workCenterSid}, #{item.workCenterCode}, #{item.productPriceType}, #{item.jixinWangongType}, #{item.department}, #{item.productSid}, #{item.productCode}, #{item.paichanBatch}, #{item.settleQuantity}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.remark}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
